ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] I'm makin fireworks, I finally got my Froglok  Ton  Totem!
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, the totem is 1 part of 4 required components which are turned in to receive an Illusion Iksar (level 16 enchanter) scroll.  The components are no drop as
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, the totem is 1 part of 4 required components which are turned in to
receive an Illusion Iksar (level 16 enchanter) scroll. The components are
no drop as is the scroll so the only known way to obtain this spell is
through completing the quest. This is doable only in Kunark.

- Azara Sparklemeister


-----Original Message-----
From: warnock@... [mailto:warnock@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 12:29 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] I'm makin fireworks, I finally got my
Froglok Ton Totem!


For this lowly lvl 11 ench, could someone explain to me what exactly the
quest is, and then what the pole does.

thanks
Calistaah
Veeshan
